definition: to go/to take/sentence-final interrogative particle/variant of 於|于[yu2]
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)
(classical particle similar to 於|于[yu2]) in/at/from/because/than/(classical final particle similar to 嗎|吗[ma5], 吧[ba5], 呢[ne5], expressing question, doubt or astonishment)

sentences.english: Thus, before the property management of residence turned off the valve, my grandmother's house was flooded.
sentences.chinese: 于是乎，在物业把总阀门关掉之前，姥姥家发大水了。

sentences.english: And , somehow or other , loveliness is infernally sad .
sentences.chinese: 于是乎，可爱竟令人感到有些许可憎的悲伤。

sentences.english: So, again, the technology is still being used.
sentences.chinese: 于是乎，这项技术还在应用。

sentences.english: So, I dreamed myself was standing in the Ta Kuan Garden this morning.
sentences.chinese: 于是乎，今早就很自然的梦到了自己站在大观园里。

sentences.english: I resolved to travel to the island of Barbados .
sentences.chinese: 我于是乎下定决心去巴贝多岛旅行。

sentences.english: Thus, wood so and hurriedly will chilly float in the sky to hand over as his invitation card.
sentences.chinese: 于是乎，林偌赶紧将寒飞扬给他的帖子交出。

sentences.english: And people continue to pour across the border by the hundreds every day.
sentences.chinese: 于是乎，每天仍然有成百上千的人跨国边界涌入南非。

sentences.english: And he began to bow to the Buddhas and study the Buddhadharma.
sentences.chinese: 于是乎，他也开始拜佛，研究佛法了。

sentences.english: The first percussion instrument was born.
sentences.chinese: 于是乎，第一个打击乐器诞生了。

definition: logical/only to be expected/rational and clearly structured (of text)
plain/informal/suitable/convenient/opportune/to urinate or defecate/equivalent to 就[jiu4]: then/in that case/even if/soon afterwards
to call by the glorified name of (idiom)

at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning
to appear to be/to seem as if
original/originally/at first/it goes without saying/of course
without any better option/to have to/to be forced to
